channel.title: Simon Wallner on LocalStack
channel.description: Recent content in Simon Wallner on LocalStack

item.title: Renaming the Pro Tier
item.description: There is a lot going on here at LocalStack, with different teams continuously delivering features and improvements in the core AWS emulator, as well as the web app and additional services. The year has only just started, and our development pipeline is bursting with even more things to come. Taking a step back and looking at our offering, we noticed that Pro is not really a fitting name for the starter tier.
